title: FTTH_Interims solution send FTTH interests (Q4/24)
description:
Description
Contacts
Stream Lead: Alexander Walter
Business: Bernd Frauenknecht, Enrico Dettmann (SGRK/SBU)
POM (Technic): Biral Arduc
  Wiki-Seite: https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=2394326530
  Description
Example of a JSON is attached, 15.000 locations should be possible to send without "Datendrehscheibe".
Accordingly, the preferred solution is a Standard RestAPI via Tardis to reduce IT effort for the interim solution
POM enters the data received into the prospective customer database and makes the data available to the technical department (Puma) with the source code "GK Großkunde-FIB". When a location reaches the expansion status "VVMongoing", an e-mail is sent to the address specified for the location. Otherwise, no further action (HTN recording, start line construction) is triggered.
  Workflow:
The user select in Location Tab "added to quote" the sites he wants to send to POM (technic) in order to notify technic about a site interests by the customer, so that technic can plan their FTTH rollout.
For this, the button "Request availabilty" gets expanded by a button:
EN: "Send FTTH interests".
DE: "In FTTH Interessenten-DB aufnehmen"
In order to send sites to POM (technic) an email per site  mandatory in order to send sites to POM (technic).This email adress fill be an FMB and will be inserted by CPQ automatically. (FMB = ?)
The selected sites (single and mass) will be send to POM (technic).
A success /error notification will be saved within PANDA for the user pro request. If an error was send, the request can be started again.
A information will be stored inside the location list pro location if a request has been send to POM (technic)
  Necessary Data to be transferred to POM:
Label: GK Großkunde-FIB (mandatory, as Default)
KLS-ID (mandatory) (Wird von Panda ergänzt, richtig?) (Ja)
PLZ (mandatory)
City (mandatory)
Street (mandatory)
Street Nr (mandatory)
Extension (if available, optional)
Customer name (mandatory)
Customer-Number (GP) (mandatory) 
(06.09.24 decision done to use the CRM-T (AGB Customer ID ) for POM, will be delivered beside the Excel template from user for each upload,
also the AGP needs to be entered in PANDA before the upload!)
Email address (mandatory) (where POM will send its feedback)
  For the interim solution, do we have to prevent a location from being sent to POM a second time by a customer? Answer: No
Is it "harmful" to hand over a location in VVM ongoing status, or better, to POM? Answer: No, it is not harmful.
What happens if something like this is done? The specified e-mail address will receive a message. Nothing else will happen.
  Die Daten aus der Interimslösung, die in die Interessentendatenbank übergeben wurden, können später in das FIB-Tool migriert werden, damit die FMBs abgelöst werden können.
Email always FMB? - Ja, es wird immer ein FMB sein. Wir benötigen keine FMB Prüfung, dies wird manuell beim Hochladen der Nutzer sichergestellt.
  out-of-scope: Geo-Data, VSNF-Data
      DOR Status Comment
Acceptance criteria are defined.  
The Epics is approved by system architects (done on Epic level). The appoval was done in develpoment circles with subject matter experts interim solution by Alicia Riedel
The Epics is prioritized within the backlog (WSJF Method)    
The Epics are understood by Dev Teams and estimated     
The Epics are documented within JIRA  
Dependencies are identified and there are no external dependencies that can´t be solved within the ART POM (technic)
Non-functional requirements (NFR) are identified. 1.000-15.000 locations
Security and privacy approval required User Stories are labelled as those. Primary in the acording Jira Parameter   
Initial high-level acceptance test cases written and reviewed by PO test cases we aggreed later on n.a.  
All the information relevant to development is linked: other stories, relevant designs, confluence sources of information, other specs n.a.  
GUI Views have been defined (in form of click-dummy) and discussed with users for implementation n.a.  
Process dependency / adaptations has been defined n.a.  
 

Business Scope:
As a PANDA user in the FTTH environment, I want to have an interim solution where I can send customer locations to the POM/IDB who are interested in a FTTH rollout. The locations are then considered within the technic for their rollout plan.
If a location has the status "VVM ongoing" a specified email address receives a message.

selected locations (single and mass) - only DE - will be send to POM (technic) in order to notify technic about a site interests by customer for ther FTTH rollout plans 
success notification about data load will be saved within PANDA for the user
